item.title: Photo highlights of the day: Milan Expo and a Cornish seahorse
item.trailText: Syrian refugees at the Turkish border, the Indian heatwave, Milan Expo, and a giant horse on a Cornish beach
item.standFirst: The Guardianâ€™s picture editors bring you a selection of the best photographs from around the world, including Syrian refugees at the Turkish border, the Indian heatwave, Milan Expo, and a giant horse on a Cornish beach

displayImages.caption: Calcutta, India Locals cool off under street traps as the temperatures reached 39 degree Celsius. According to reports the death toll from temperatures which have hit a 20 year high have claimed almost 1700 lives as Indians, especially in the south continue to suffer Photograph: Piyal Adhikary/EPA
